animeDescription: Music video directed by Shinichiro Watanabe for the single More (feat. Anderson .Paak) by American record producer Flying Lotus (Steven Ellison). It is featured on his sixth studio album "Flamagra." Flying Lotus and Shinichiro Watanabe's creative kinship was cultivated while working on Blade Runner: Black Out 2022, and the mutual respect led them to collaborating on this video.
